title: How to Complete All 50 Waves of Horde on Gears of War 2

steps.headline: Before you start, pick who is doing what.
steps.description: One person needs to use the basic weapons and pick up ammo regularly and defend the second player. The second player should use one of the special weapons.

steps.headline: Choose the map.
steps.description: The map that you must use is day one as there is a good hiding spot on the map.

steps.headline: Go to the building that is pictured on the bottom right which you need to go up the stairs on.
When the match starts, the player who is using the special weapons can go up there first and get the gun, which will either be the Longshot sniper rifle or the torque bow.
steps.description: The other player can get the ammo box in between the cars.

steps.headline: At the very back of the roof is a back part which sticks out.
steps.description: Jump over the barrier to get into it.

steps.headline: Once you are there, you can camp for the whole 50 waves.
steps.description: It should be pretty easy as long as you cover yourself, since the back part has no walls. Always shoot the enemies that are shooting you before going after any others.

steps.headline: The locust normally come up the stairs, but sometimes they glitch and try to get you from beneath.
steps.description: If this happens, just walk to the edge and shoot downward at them. Don't worry, you cannot fall of the ledge.

steps.headline: If you begin to run out of ammo, just go down to the ammo box between the cars, but make sure the other player has you covered or you might get surrounded.
Be aware that the special weapons and the ammo box only respawn at the start of a new wave, so use your ammo wisely.
If you just stay in that spot for most of the match, you will be able to survive all the way up to wave 50.

text: Before you start, pick who is doing what. One person needs to use the basic weapons and pick up ammo regularly and defend the second player. The second player should use one of the special weapons. Choose the map. The map that you must use is day one as there is a good hiding spot on the map. Go to the building that is pictured on the bottom right which you need to go up the stairs on.  When the match starts, the player who is using the special weapons can go up there first and get the gun, which will either be the Longshot sniper rifle or the torque bow. The other player can get the ammo box in between the cars. At the very back of the roof is a back part which sticks out. Jump over the barrier to get into it. Once you are there, you can camp for the whole 50 waves. It should be pretty easy as long as you cover yourself, since the back part has no walls. Always shoot the enemies that are shooting you before going after any others. The locust normally come up the stairs, but sometimes they glitch and try to get you from beneath. If this happens, just walk to the edge and shoot downward at them. Don't worry, you cannot fall of the ledge. If you begin to run out of ammo, just go down to the ammo box between the cars, but make sure the other player has you covered or you might get surrounded.  Be aware that the special weapons and the ammo box only respawn at the start of a new wave, so use your ammo wisely.  If you just stay in that spot for most of the match, you will be able to survive all the way up to wave 50.
